archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.2.8c: c) the organisation registers domain names that could be used to masquerade as the organisation, such as common misspellings of the organisation's name (also known as homoglyphs), to help prevent phishing attacks
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
